entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:16 PM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Showers along parts of the coast overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 1:16 PM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022
